segments.text: I feel so worried looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks like it’s going to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not realizing how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery, and someone is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would do something before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the peaceful garden and the chaos inside is unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this anymore; it’s making me too anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
